mapper.sql: dept_id, inner_code, org_code, dept_code, dept_name, dept_desc, manager_uids, status, valid_flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from base_dept
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into base_dept (dept_id, inner_code, org_code, dept_code, dept_name, dept_desc, manager_uids, status, valid_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerUids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

inner_code,
org_code,
dept_code,
dept_name,
dept_desc,
manager_uids,
status,
valid_flag,

update_time,

mapper.update:

dept_id = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
inner_code = #{record.innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
